column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////All of this is to say that this restaurant is very inaccessible. Between their short hours
column4: it probably won't be worth a fourth effort for me. There are few places I'd go through this much trouble to visit
column5: and odds are those places would take a reservation anyway. Too much good food in Houston to go through this for lunch again. For what it's worth...
